title.narrative: Renewable Energy and Access for All

description.narrative: With a focus on grid-connected distributed renewable energy, it aims to demonstrate the feasibility of using renewable energy to provide reliable and affordable electricity services in EDH grid connected areas, for future replication and scale-up. It will support the construction of 6 – 12 MW of (solar PV plant + battery) which would hybridize 2 -3 EDH grids, currently running of diesel power.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
